name: Ant, MBA
description:
In this game, you play as an ant who's trying to work his way up the corporate ladder of the real life business world. Find out how ruthless and difficult it can be to achieve synergy, especially when you're just an ant.

Controls: You are an ant. Use the arrow keys to move, and space to jump, when appropriate.

Created by:

Jake Cohen (github.com/soggychips)

Jon Banashek (github.com/banashek)

Evan Sullivan (github.com/Darkfox3889)
